short.de: Preis tracking und Preis-Benachrichtigungen für alle Amazon Produkte
short.es: Agrega seguimiento de precios y la opción de recibir alertas sobre caídas de precios en todos los sitios de Amazon
short.fr: Ajoute le suivi des prix et la possibilité d'être alerté des baisses de prix sur tous les sites Amazon
short.it: Aggiunge il monitoraggio dei prezzi e l'opzione per essere avvisati in caso di riduzioni di prezzo su tutti i siti Amazon
short.ja: すべての Amazon サイトに価格追跡と値下げ時にアラートを受け取るオプションを追加
short.tr: Tüm Amazon sitelerine fiyat takibi ve fiyat düşüşlerinde uyarı alma seçeneği ekler

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_US,e:
🪙 Find great deals when shopping on Amazon.

⚡ Know the best time to buy 
Add items to your Droplist via the extension popup menu from any Amazon product site and Cart Scout will track the price. 

🚩 Price drop & availability notifications
Set up alerts and get notified when Cart Scout detects a price drop or coupon, so you don't miss a deal.

🪙 Data security
Unlike other Amazon price trackers, Cart Scout does not communicate with any other server other than Amazon.

🪙 Supports Amazon .com | .co.uk | .de | .co.jp | .fr | .ca | .it | .es | .se | .com.mx

🪙 Language support for English | Deutsch | 日本語 | Français | Italiano | Español
long.de,en_GB,es,fr,it,ja,tr:
🛒 Secure Price Charts
Navigate to your favorite products and start tracking them from the extension popup menu. A private price chart is generated which is automatically updated.

🛒 Data Security
Unlike other Amazon price trackers, this extension does not communicate with any other server other than Amazon and cannot use your bandwidth and/or IP address to send back price scraping information.

🛒 Price drop & Availability Notifications
Set up notifications directly from the extension popup. You will be notified once the product dropped below your desired price.

🛒 Daily Deals & Coupons
This extension finds the best deals every day. Order all tracked products by the highest drop in price for quick inspection.

🛒 Supports Amazon .com | .co.uk | .de | .co.jp | .fr | .ca | .it | .es | .se | .com.mx

🛒 Language Support for English | Deutsch | 日本語 | Français | Italiano | Español
